fields.short_description: Max is passionate about sharing his understanding of all the details that create a good connection between partners and give the most energy to the Lindy Hop. He is dedicated to spread the passion of swing all over the world, pursuing Frankie Manning’s vision.

Irene started dancing at the age of three. Trained in classical dancing for fourteen years, she stopped, to search for a dance that would allow her to feel more free and creative. She tried different things like contemporary, butoh and african modern jazz until she finally discovered lindy hop.

Kıvanç started dancing unwillingly at the age of 5 in a Turkish wedding. After that event he created fear for dancing till 2009 when he met Lindy Hop. A year immediately after, he started teaching lindy hop to his friends  at Herrang in 2010, during the class breaks, to show off.

İdil started lindy hop in the beginning of 2009 and it was a love at first sight. Since then she has been learning, dancing and teaching in the local scene. For her, dancing lindy hop is being in touch with the spirit.
Felipe is a champion improviser and solo dancer.
Laura loves to create choreography and perform.

Vitalii is known for his creative approach to moves and steps variations with close focus on technical side of leading and following.
While putting most of their attention to the social element of the swing dance, Vitalii is an active performer.
Oksana has been teaching lindy-hop since 2008 in Ukraine and internationally as well as organizing some swing dance events in Ukraine.

Naomi Uyama discovered lindy hop in her hometown of Washington DC during the late nineties. Over the past decade she has taught workshops all around the world and performed for dance and music legends alike.
Peter Strom is one of the most dedicated and well traveled instructors on the lindy hop scene today. His humor in classes is only matched by the clarity and care he takes with his students.

Besides her amazing skills in Charleston, Lindy Hop and Jazz Dance, Frida is a member of the Harlem Hot Shots and runs the famous Lindy Hop dance camp that she first attended back when she was 15, The Herrang Dance Camp in Sweden.

Originally pressured into taking Lindy Hop classes by his mother at the tender age of 12, Skye soon found that social dancing really is the best thing in life. Over the past 14 years he has performed, taught, and competed both nationally and internationally.
With a strong passion for the social dance floor, Cam is constantly challenging himself (and his partner) for innovation and creativity and is always excited to see what comes out of the next dance.

Cat has been lindy hopping since 2005. After 3 years teaching for her University scene and locally around Newcastle, Cat moved back to Liverpool and established ‘Mersey Swing’, and remains creative director of this fast growing scene.

Kevin St. Laurent began his dancing career at the young age of eight years. Though initially reluctant, his mother insisted he "try it" for a little while. He's been 'trying' it ever since. His initial 3 years were spent studying tap, ballet, and jazz.

Internationally renown dancer, choreographer, and teacher specializing in Lindy Hop, Charleston, & other authentic dances from the 1920-1940s. Jo has spent her life traveling the world spreading jazz culture through vintage partner dancing and has taught and performed in 25 countries across 5 continents. She is a passionate and avid dancer, instructor and competitor.

Swinging melodies for your feet, once more in istanbul!
After an amazing first year, we're excited to see you here for the second edition of Crossover istanbul.

Istanbul is a city that holds both Asia and Europe inside. We walk around different worlds on daily basis, we cross bridges, take something from every culture we touch and make a new, tempting potion. Let's cross over new ideas and dance them out!
fields.name: Crossover Istanbul
fields.slogan: Lindy Hop & Authentic Jazz weekend in Istanbul !

fields.short_description: A short lindy camp with amazing teachers.
fields.name: The Lindy Camp

90th year celebration remembering the Savoy Ballroom!

*** Thursday, March 10th :: 

8 pm - 1 am
Yehoodi.com's Frim Fram Jam
Club 412

New York, New York 10001 
http://yehoodi.com/frimfram

Drink, lounge, be merry and best of all: dance, dance, DANCE!
Still only $10! ($7 for students with ID)
Swing dance lesson from 8-9 pm, $4 with your paid admission.
Featuring DJs ::  TBA



*** Friday, March 11th ::

Rainbow Room
Dinner & Dancing
The GEORGE GEE SWING ORCHESTRA
Entertainment from 7:30 PM - 11:30 PM 
7:30 PM -11:30 PM
https://www.rainbowroom.com/

Dance only entry ::
$50 at 9 pm, cash or credit card. Band plays to 11:30 pm. George Gee will DJ until midnight. 
https://www.facebook.com/events/1164489873575492/

Kindly note that jackets are required for dinner service. Ties are optional. No t-shirts, shorts or tennis shoes please.

The iconic Rainbow Room invites guests for an unforgettable night of dinner and dancing in the sky. These legendary evenings have defined New York City glamour for over 80 years—big band leaders serenade couples as they glide across the famed rotating dancefloor and dine on a world-class menu, all framed by striking Manhattan cityscapes. Perched 65 stories above the landmark Rockefeller Center, Dinner & Dancing at the Rainbow Room electrifies the evening, infusing romance and allure into unforgettable moments.

Pricing is per person and inclusive of entertainment and prix fixe dinner menu; excludes beverages, tax and gratuity. Pricing may vary based on programming and day of the week.

Reservations are accepted up to six weeks in advance by calling our reservationists at 212.632.5000, option #1, or by clicking here to reserve online.

For groups larger than eight and for private dining inquiries, please call 212.632.5051.


*** Saturday, March 12th :: 

Group photo @ 3:30 pm
Savoy Plaque/Marker in NYC
directions- http://www.savoyplaque.org/direction.htm
(Go visit the Savoy Marker in Harlem, but leave a balloon, button, flowers or do something creative like handing out 90 cupcakes to people passing by)
OPEN TO THE PUBLIC :: FREE 

&

Evening dance hosted by...
The Harlem Swing Dance Society and the NYC Parks & Recreation.
SAVOY 90! A Harem Swing Dance Celebration
Time --- 5:30 PM - 9pm
Pelham Fritz Recreation Center
18 Mt Morris Pk West  and W 123rd St, New York, New York
FREE Event: Join us in celebrating the Savoy Ballroom's rich history on its 90th anniversary!  We start off with a dance lesson at  5:30 and then from 6:30 till 9pm we will enjoy the classic jazz and swing tunes of The Harlem Renaissance Orchestra.  There will be historic Harlem Dance History by means of a performance, vintage Harlem dance clips and some photos. So come on and dance and enjoy jazz at a real Harlem Swing Dance Party !
Event Link with Full details   -https://www.facebook.com/events/235166740155259/


Housing ::

https://www.airbnb.com/

http://www.couchsurfing.org/

*** The event schedule is subject to change ***

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

More about the Savoy Ballroom ::

https://castledanceproject.wordpress.com/2012/03/07/the-savoy-ballroom-harlem-ny/

The Savoy Ballroom was located at 596 Lenox Avenue, between West 140th Street and West 141st Street, New York.


**** subject to changes and revisions ****

(revised on March 8, 2016)",)
fields.name: Savoy Ballroom Anniversary Celebration :: March 12th

fields.short_description:
("The HOT RHYTHM HOLIDAY!
The uniquely epic weekend of jazz music and swing dancing!

Join us January 27th-29th, 2017 in Austin, TX!

Music and Dance Classes all weekend!

Collegiate Shag ~ Balboa ~ Lindy Hop ~ Charleston
(Beginner through Advanced)

- Social dancing every night with live music! -
- Music courses with master jazz musicians! - 
- Ensemble classes, music theory, and jazz history! -
- Panel discussions with the instructors! -
- Dance competitions and special performances! -

All classes and dances will be held at the beautiful and historic Texas Federation of Women's Club's mansion!

More details to be announced soon!!

Check out our website at www.hotrhythmholiday.com.
or email us at info@hotrhythmholiday.com

We look forward to seeing you there!!",)

fields.short_description:
('SAVE THE DATE! 

Come join us for the Bristol Swing Exchange 2016!

It’s going to be a wonderful weekend of dancing with lots of live music, spectacular bands, an amazing Saturday night venue, a mysterious late night party and daytime activities.

This is the perfect chance to visit the friendliest and kindest city in the UK! (it’s official, read this if you need proof http://bit.ly/1XMFtuQ )

Bookings will open very soon, so keep an eye on this page.
There will a limited number of Early Birds tickets, after that Late Cats prices will apply. 

More information about our amazing bands and venues will be released closer to the date, so please stay tuned! 

If you want to get in touch, feel free to drop us a line at bristolswingexchange@gmail.com

fields.short_description:
("Swing Castle Camp, the 'Sodom & Gomorrha of Swing', invites you for another debaucherous week in Jazz paradize*.

You will meet
Peter & Katja
Kevin & Jo
Andy & Alice
Alba & Gas
and
Rikard
in the beautiful castle of Beesenstedt.

* A fine 2015 participant in the survey:
“Because it has captured the whole point of Swing dancing for me. Because it is magical and otherworldly, and far too intense, and filled with the promise of mischief. Because the people that make it happen are unique and fantastic, because the castle itself is charming and slightly mouldy, because the bar is always open and anything goes. Because you can stay up late enough to find those unforgettable dances, and you can leave a little more whole and brokenhearted than the last time you visited.”

Check it out:
https://vimeo.com/castlecamp",)
fields.name: Swing Castle Camp 2016

fields.short_description:
("Lindy Cake 2016: Freiburg's very own Lindy Exchange

Introducing the second Lindy Cake; that sweet and tasty four day Lindy event nestled comfortably on the edge of the Black Forest. From the 22nd to the 25th of September 2016.

In order to make this event you will need:

4 nights of parties plus a teatime hop
3 days of live bands and activities
A pinch of Gentlemen & Gangsters
A handful of excited dancers
and a generous amount of creativity

Mix them together, garnish with a layer of fun and leave to bake in your calender until September!

Registration opens on the 6th of June at 6pm.

Welcome to the Lindy Cake 2016!",)

fields.short_description:
('Come to Balboa heaven*.

And look who will be there:
Shani & Jacob
Bobby & Kate
Adam & Nelle
Mickey & Masha
Sanna & Adam
Mel & Jo
and many more...

* One fine 2015 participant in the survey:
“Because it has captured the whole point of Swing dancing for me. Because it is magical and otherworldly, and far too intense, and filled with the promise of mischief. Because the people that make it happen are unique and fantastic, because the castle itself is charming and slightly mouldy, because the bar is always open and anything goes. Because you can stay up late enough to find those unforgettable dances, and you can leave a little more whole and brokenhearted than the last time you visited.”

AND you can stay a weekend longer (or another week) in heaven: Swing Castle Camp, the ‘Sodom and Gomorrha of Swing’ follows up directly…:
https://www.facebook.com/events/493384737499466/
http://www.swingcastlecamp.de',)

fields.short_description:
("****** ENGLISH BELOW ******

El Festival Internacional de Lindy Hop que tiene lugar del 2 al 4 de Septiembre 2016 en la Costa Brava. ¡Abrimos inscripciones el 9 de Marzo a las 23:00h! 

- Thomas Blacharz & Pamela Gaizutyte
- Ali Taghavi & Katja Uckermann
- William Mauvais & Maéva Truntzer
- Vincenzo Fesi & Jana Grulichová
- Sharon Davis
- Rikard Ekstrand

¿De qué disfrutarás este año?

- 4 niveles de Lindy
- 2 niveles de Solo Jazz Track con Rikard Ekstrand
- 2 niveles de Followers Track con Sharon Davis
- 3 Fiestas & Cata de Vinos & Afterparty
- 4 Bandas diferentes, incluyendo una Big Band
- Alojamiento y todas las comidas incluidas
- Clases desde Viernes para disfrutar de más tiempo libre
- Playa & Piscina para relajarse

Consulta toda la información en www.swimoutcostabrava.com

¡Deseando recibirte a bordo del Swim Out Costa Brava!

****** ENGLISH******

The International Lindy Hop Festival that takes places from 2nd to 4th September at the Costa Brava - Spain. Registration will open March 9th, 2016 at 11:00 PM! 

- Thomas Blacharz & Pamela Gaizutyte
- Ali Taghavi & Katja Uckermann
- William Mauvais & Maéva Truntzer
- Vincenzo Fesi & Jana Grulichová
- Sharon Davis
- Rikard Ekstrand

What's waiting for you?

- 4 Lindy Levels 
- 2 Solo Jazz Track Levels with Rikard Ekstrand
- 2 Followers Track Levels with Sharon Davis
- 3 Parties & Wine Tasting & Afterparty
- 4 different Bands, including a Big Band
- Accommodation and all meals included
- Classes start on Friday to enjoy more leisure time
- Beach & Swimming Pool to relax

Check out all the informations on www.swimoutcostabrava.com 

Looking forward to welcome you on board the Swim Out Costa Brava!",)
fields.name: Swim Out Costa Brava 2016

fields.short_description:
("Join us October 21-23rd, 2016, in Denver, Colorado for the 
10th Anniversary of Rocky Mountain Balboa Blowout, 
featuring the return of Rocky a.k.a.Marty!

Registration is now open!  This year we are in the Double Tree Castle Events Center and Hotel in Thornton Colorado.  All events in one convenient location, hotel rooms only $115 and includes breakfast.  Airport shuttles available based with advance reservations,3-5 passengers.   

Featuring instructors:
Mickey and Kelly, Nick and Sylvia, Andreas Olsson, Moe Sakan, Heather Ballew, Bobby White, Kate Hedin, David Rehm, and More TBA!

We'll have two nights of live music with Jonathan Stout, Hillary Alexander, Campus Five!

More info to come!",)
fields.name: Rocky Mountain Balboa Blowout - 10th Anniversary

fields.short_description:
("((CASTELLANO MÁS ABAJO))
Estàs boig per ballar? Series capaç de ballar tot un cap de setmana sense parar, compartir sostre amb hoppers, beure, sopar, esmorzar a ritme de swing, tirar-te a la piscina per refrescar-te entre ball i ball, rebre tallers de ball i deixar-te la pell amb els concerts?

Llavors el Crazy Weekend és el teu cap de setmana! Un cap de setmana boig a la Casa de colònies les Tallades (Vilanova de Sau) el 26, 27 i 28 d'agost. 

Durant més de 40 hores la música no pararà ni un segon! Amb més de 6 hores de música en directe

Hi haurà tallers de ball per tots!

Competició de ball amb dos nivells de Jack and Jill.

També tindrem moments per relaxar-te a la piscina i passejar pel magnífic entorn natural que ens rodejarà.

I perquè no us falti energia, farem sopar (divendres), esmorzar, dinar, sopar i xocolatada (el dissabte) i esmorzar i dinar (el diumenge). Per recarregar les piles, els que no estigueu entrenats per ballar tantes hores, tenim preparades 220 lliteres ;) No t'oblidis el sac de dormir o llençols!

Tot inclòs en el preu!

Hi haurà premi pel que aguanti tot el Crazy Weekend sense dormir!

Places disponibles per 220 persones!

Obrim inscripcions aquest divendres dia 4 de Març a les 21:00

Preus:
del 1 al 30: alumnes 130€/ no alumnes 140€
del 31 al 60: alumnes 140€/ no alumnes 150€
del 61 al 90: alumnes 150€/ no alumnes 160€
del 91 al 120: alumnes 160€/ no alumnes 170€
del 121 al 150: alumnes 170€/ no alumnes 180€
del 151 al 180: alumnes 180€/ no alumnes 190€
Següents: alumnes 190€/ no alumnes 200€

Let's Crazy Weekend!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

CASTELLANO:
Estás loco por bailar? Serías capaz de bailar todo un fin de semana sin parar, compartir techo con hoppers, comer, cenar, desayunar a ritmo de swing, tirarte a la piscina para refrescarte entre baile y baile, recibir talleres de baile y dejarte la piel en los conciertos?

Entonces el Crazy Weekend es tu fin de semana! Un fin de semana loco en la Casa de colònies les Tallades (Vilanova de Sau) el 26, 27 y 28 de agosto. 

Durante 48 horas la música no parará ni un segundo! Con más de 6 horas de música en directo

Habrá talleres de baile para todos!

Competición de baile con dos niveles de Jack and Jill.

También tendremos momentos para relajarnos en la piscina y pasear por el magnífico entorno natural que nos rodeará.

Y para que no nos falte la energía, haremos cena (los que vengáis el viernes), comida, cena y chocolatada (el sábado) y desayuno y comida (el domingo). Para reponer fuerzas para los que no estén tan entrenados tenemos preparadas 220 literas ;-). Importante: No te olvides el saco de dormir o las sábanas!

Todo incluido en el precio!

Habrá premio para el que aguante todo el Crazy Weekend sin dormir!

Plazas disponibles para 220 personas!

Abrimos inscripciones el viernes 4 de marzo a las 21:00

Precios:
del 1 al 30: alumnos 130€/ no alumnos 140€
del 31 al 60: alumnos 140€/ no alumnos 150€
del 61 al 90: alumnos 150€/ no alumnos 160€
del 91 al 120: alumnos 160€/ no alumnos 170€
del 121 al 150: alumnos 170€/ no alumnos 180€
del 151 al 180: alumnos 180€/ no alumnos 190€
Siguientes: alumnos 190€/ no alumnos 200€

Let's Crazy Weekend!",)
fields.name: VII Crazy Weekend 2016!

fields.short_description:
('TEACHERS LIKE IT NERDY!
All great teachers we’ve met like it nerdy… in fact, the nerdier the better. Whether you are working full-time in your local scene, teach at international camps, teach for your local non-profit association, or hold drop-in classes at a university, as a teacher, you are passionate about the dance and share the desire to improve. We have created a 5-day seminar that will give you deep insight in how to run your scene and become a better teacher.

You’ll learn how to:
- teach the kind of classes you wish you’d had AND keep your students wanting more
- optimize your marketing, grow your community and put yourself on the map
- have time for your own development even when organizing and teaching keeps you super-busy
- stand out as a teacher even when your competition grows

All the facts at one glance

What: Pedagogy, management, productivity and marketing training for swing dance teachers.

When: Monday 22nd to Friday 26th of August 2016

Teachers:

SwingStep (DE): Ali Taghavi, Kris Blindert
Swing Patrol (UK): Scott Cupit, Laura Cupit Knight
Holy Lindy Land (IL): Ron Dobrovinsky
(NL): Pieter Aart Schouten

Language: English

Where: SwingStep Studio in Berlin, Rudolfstraße 1-3, 10245 Berlin

Price: 390 Euro* for 30h of teachers training, two parties + the chance to get in-class-feedback.

*SPECIAL NOTE: Because of the special nature of this workshop it’s priced higher than a regular dance workshop. However, we don’t want the price to be a limiting factor for you. If you need help to afford participating, please send us an email at ali@swingstep.com so that we can figure out a way to make it work for you and for us.

REGISTRATION WILL OPEN ON Sunday 10th January 2016, at 19:00 CET

Detailed info about Schedule here: http://swingstep.com/workshops/teachers-training/',)
fields.name: Teachers Training Summit

fields.short_description:
('First and best thing to do next summerr? Mark your calendars! :) 
We are already working on next  edition of Policoro in Swing and it is going to be soooo good! 

Policoro in Swing will take place between the 21st and 28th of August 2016. 
Enjoy the holidays of your life together with a bunch of crazy people who can’t keep their feet still. Are you ready for another week of dancing, sailing, relaxing in the sun, contagious smiles, lovely new friends and jam sessions until sunrise?! 

What you are supposed to bring? A pair of dance shoes (the experience showed that a few more would be even better) and your energy at its best! 

Be prepared for our Lindy Hop, Balboa, Blues, Vintage Jazz and Taster Classes...be tuned as we are spicing up our festival program with some tasty news!

See you there?

Teacher Lineup:

- Marcus&Barbl (DE)
- Martynas&Egle&Lina (LT)
- Abeth&Olivier (USA/FR)
- Gas&Alba (ES)
- Max & Manuel (FR/IT)

- Ilario & Egle (IT)
- Morris & Marcella (IT)
- Emanuele & Katharina (IT)
- Matteo & Kamile (IT/LT)
- Livio & Morena (IT)


°°°°

- Lara Luppi & Lalla Hop

and others TBA
